projects.name: Career Cafe
projects.description: A discussion forum for professionals to share job opportunities and discuss career related topics. Front and back end fully implemented.

projects.name: A* Pathfinding With Portals
projects.description: An interactive implementation of the A* algorithm to find the shortest path between two points, spiced up with teleporation using portals!

projects.name: Flappy Bird Genetic Algorithm
projects.description: A JavaScript implementation of the genetic algorithm described in the paper Neuroevolution of Augmenting Topologies. It's being used here to learn the game flappy bird.

projects.name: Dot Swarm Pathfinding
projects.description: A small, interactive game where you guide a swarm of black dots around obstacles to a goal. The dots are controlled by a genetic algorithm, which I specifically made to be interactive to encourage experimenting.

projects.name: Growth Tracker
projects.description: A plant themed journaling extension with 4000+ users over Firefox and Chrome.

projects.name: Tetris Clone
projects.description: My version of modern Tetris. One of my first personal projects in only HTML and JavaScript. I came back to this project a few years later to improve aesthetics and performance.

projects.name: Hi-Stress
projects.description: An educational game created to highlight the importance of mental health for balancing a busy schedule as a college student. An entry for the WinHacks 2022 hackathon, created in collaboration with a friend.

projects.name: Group Sentimental
projects.description: A journalling website using sentiment analysis and regression to predict your mood. The 2nd place winner of BCHacks 5.0 üèÜ

projects.name: Save-on Points
projects.description: Scrapes data directly from the Save-On Foods website to mathmatically calculate the best deals for you.

projects.name: blur
projects.description: A collaborative project to provide an open-source platform for easy video creation and sharing with specific users. My undergraduate capstone project
